title: Cable giant Comcast wants to be Roku – and is making a 4K streaming box to prove it
description: Cable giant Comcast will start selling streamers and smart TVs in a bid to get in on the free ad-supported TV market.

title: Google warning its own staff about chatbots may be a bad sign
description: According to a new report, Google has been warning its employees about the dangers of chatbot AI use even as it rolls out Bard globally.

title: Mercedes-Benz is bringing ChatGPT into cars for the first time
description: Mercedes is upgrading its in-car voice assistant in order to hold contextual conversations, but only in the United States.

title: AWS has a new automation feature to save you from mind-numbing security work
description: New AWS feature hopes to put an end to tedious security admin.

title: Intel's new processor branding drops the 'i' – and the ball
description: Intel will officially rebrand its Core series processors from 'Core i' to 'Core' and 'Core Ultra', and it doesn't make a whole lot of sense.

title: Are you backing up your photos? This survey says most of us aren't
description: Photography survey reveals just 35% regularly backup photos and videos - but most of us don't look back on old images anyway.

title: VPN providers react to Apple TV third-party app support
description: As VPN firms explore the possibility of developing a suitable Apple TV VPN, we talked to some of the main providers on the market to know more.

title: Big Tech knows most Brits don't know how to protect their online privacy
description: The latest Proton VPN study found that two thirds of people would rather lose their passport than access to their email account. Here's all you need to know.

title: WhatsApp for Android may soon let you switch accounts on the same device
description: WhatsApp could be getting a majorly sought-after feature, which would allow Android app users to switch accounts on the same device.

title: Technics’ new earbuds are smaller and cheaper, but still pack the best premium feature
description: Technics’ new EAH-AZ40M2 earbuds are smaller and cheaper than the AZ60M2, but they still have the flagship AZ80 model's best perk.

title: Anker is making a giant battery pack for your house
description: Anker, the brand known best for making battery packs for phones, has made a battery for your house.

title: This new malware targets Discord and browser data using one major unique feature
description: Malware is taking a turn as attackers choose new ways of obtaining sensitive data, and researchers are forced to adapt.

title: LockBit ransomware has cost victims millions in the US alone
description: CISA and FBI report sheds light on one of the most prolific ransomware groups out there.

title: Saatva mattress prices go up tomorrow, so today's the day to buy
description: Many of Saatva's mattresses are going to be more expensive tomorrow, so get in before the price increase.

title: Prime Video launches cheaper tier with ads in India – and the US and UK could be next
description: Amazon's streaming platform has officially followed Netflix and Max's lead with a cheaper, ad-based subscription tier.

title: This malicious Google Chrome extension could hijack your devices if you try and download pirate movies
description: Be careful about what you Chrome extensions you install and what lurks beneath, HP warns.

title: Watch out - a fake security researcher is pushing malware disguised as zero-day PoC
description: Someone's creating fake accounts on GitHub and Twitter and using them to push malware.

title: Dead Island 2 DLC is coming in two story-focused expansions, Deep Silver announces

description: Sony's long-awaited successors to the all-conquering WF-1000XM4 sound superb.

title: Future iPhones could get super-tough glass that makes cases obsolete
description: Apple has been awarded a patent for the development of super-durable iPhone panels.

title: These neurohacking AI headphones can track your brain waves to help you focus
description: Neurable's headphones know when your brain is tired and can tell you to take a five-minute cognitive break.

title: Twitter is being evicted from one of its main offices for not paying its rent
description: Elon Musk has refused to pay rent at Twitter’s HQ for months, the few workers that remain are now being evicted.

title: Steam gets a huge free update on PC, and it’s good news for Steam Deck too
description: Major Steam update brings a new look, better notifications and new in-game overlay.

title: Google Maps Immersive View just keeps getting better

title: Windows 11 just got a huge new feature for the stylus, finally catching up with Apple’s iPad
description: Here’s some great news for Windows 11 users who are jealous of this nifty iPad feature for the Apple Pencil.

title: Meta urged to act on rising consumer fraud scams
description: Heightened fraud sees British bank outline steps for Meta to regain control of scams on its platforms.

title: Netflix and Apple TV Plus just renewed two of their biggest hit TV shows
description: Two of the best TV shows to stream right now have been green-lit for second seasons.

title: Mortal Kombat 1 is being stress-tested next week and you could be part of it

title: Google Docs is finally fixing one of its most annoying pain points

title: Forget waterproof – Samsung’s earbuds seem to be fireproof
